授業方法:
Format: face-to-face classes. This may be subject to change depending on the situation in September.

Fall intensive English will prepare students to learn through a number of different academic contexts. Students can expect to learn through face-to-face lessons, video lectures and discussions. This class will be taught using a number of applications including Google Classroom.

第1回: Week 1: Course introduction and needs analysis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be expected to prepare for lessons before class. Students will also be expected to conduct research for presentations and projects outside of class.

教科書/Required texts1: Pathways: Listening, Speaking and Critical Thinking
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
